order.label: Order
order.extra: The minimum order is the default workspace
order.next: The default value is obtained by the current last workspace {{name}}($t(common.order): {{order}}) + 10.

edit workspace.title: Edit Workspace
edit workspace.remove confirm: Are you sure? This operation won't remove hard drive directories or files

delete directory: Remove from workspace, won't remove hard disk directories or files.

import directory.title: Add Directory
import directory.have not selected: Least choose one directory to import
import directory.glob extra: Takes high priority if modified, will be used on every syncing.

playerPassMode.label: File parameter pass mode
playerPassMode.tooltip: Don't know how to? Try without modifying the defaults

playerParameter.label: Player parameters
playerParameter.help: Pass to player executable. Use <1>%f</1> for file list when choosing `list` pass mode.
playerParameter.invalid list: Must contain `%f` when using `list` pass mode

glob.label: Glob Rules
glob.tooltip: Use <1>glob</1> to match contents in directories, DON'T change unless you know the result explicity

viewMode.label: View Mode
viewMode.tooltip: Changing the global setting will not reset view mode in workspace/directory which it has been selected

sync.title: Sync {{name}}
sync.popover: Sync from hard drive (due to performance reasons, you need to manually sync after adding/deleting videos)
